GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
iio: trigger: sysfs: fix possible memory leak in iio_sysfs_trig_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit 2c4e65285bdea23fd36d2ff376006ac64db6f42e, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 1f785681a87068f123d3e23da13b2c55ab4f93ac. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iio: trigger: sysfs: fix possible memory leak in iio_sysfs_trig_init()
OSV.details:
